statements: SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Actor';
SELECT id, name FROM celebrities WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT name, salary FROM celebrities ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE salary BETWEEN 30000 AND 60000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM celebrities;
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Actor' ORDER BY name DESC, salary ASC
SELECT name, salary FROM celebrities WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE salary < 10000 AND occupation = 'Singer'
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM celebrities ORDER BY id
SELECT occupation, COUNT(*) AS total_celebrities FROM celebrities GROUP BY occupation ORDER BY total_celebrities DESC
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, occupation FROM Celebrities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, salary FROM Celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT occupation, COUNT(*) AS total FROM Celebrities GROUP BY occupation ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, salary FROM Celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Actor' AND salary < 100000 ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE salary BETWEEN 70000 AND 90000;
SELECT id, name, occupation, salary FROM Celebrities WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, profession, salary FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT title, release_date, budget, director FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT c.name, m.title, e.earnings FROM celebrities c JOIN earnings e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN movies m ON e.movie_id = m.id WHERE c.profession = 'Singer';
SELECT * FROM earnings ORDER BY earnings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM celebrities ORDER BY salary DESC, name ASC
SELECT name, profession, salary FROM celebrities WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT title, release_date, budget, director FROM movies WHERE budget > 1000000 ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT c.name, m.title, e.earnings FROM celebrities c JOIN earnings e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN movies m ON e.movie_id = m.id

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, m.title AS movie_title, e.earnings AS earnings_amt FROM celebrities c JOIN earnings e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN movies m ON e.movie_id = m.id WHERE e.earnings > 100000 ORDER BY e.earnings DESC
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT id, name FROM agents WHERE commission_rate > 0.1;
SELECT name, profession, salary FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT celebrity_id, SUM(total_earnings) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY celebrity_id;
SELECT name, profession, salary FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT name, agency, commission_rate FROM agents ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, a.name AS agent_name, contract_value FROM contracts JOIN celebrities c ON c.id = contracts.celebrity_id JOIN agents a ON a.id = contracts.agent_id WHERE contract_value > 100000 ORDER BY contract_value ASC;
SELECT celebrity_id, SUM(total_earnings) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY celebrity_id HAVING total_earnings > 50000;

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, a.agent_name AS agent_name, e.total_earnings FROM celebrities c JOIN agents a JOIN earnings e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id AND a.id = (SELECT agent_id FROM contracts WHERE celebrity_id = c.id) WHERE e.total_earnings > 30000 ORDER BY e.total_earnings DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, salary FROM Celebrities WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT movie_name, release_year FROM Movies ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT award_name, year FROM Awards WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM Assets WHERE value = (SELECT MAX(value) FROM Assets);
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT name, salary FROM Celebrities ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT movie_name, release_year FROM Movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY release_year ASC
SELECT a.award_name, c.name FROM Awards a JOIN Celebrities c ON a.celebrity_id = c.id

SELECT r.relationship_type, c1.name AS celebrity1, c2.name AS celebrity2 FROM Relationships r JOIN Celebrities c1 ON r.celebrity_id1 = c1.id JOIN Celebrities c2 ON r.celebrity_id2 = c2.id WHERE r.relationship_type = 'Family'
